definition: forged money/fictitious bills/see also 芭樂|芭乐[ba1 le4]

sentences.english: Strong wind blew off the pineapple guavas .
Your quinces and pineapple guavas have gone quickly.
sentences.chinese: 你的榲桲和鳳梨芭樂銷路挺快。

sentences.english: Will you believe we do not have such a large guava tree in northern California?
sentences.chinese: 你相信我們在北加州，並沒有這麼大棵的芭樂樹嗎？

sentences.english: Guavas With strong vitality, on behalf of health.
sentences.chinese: 芭樂強勁的生命力，代表健康。
不知道那個芭樂，不在載貨單上。

sentences.english: Like the pineapple guavas as much as we do.
sentences.chinese: 像人一樣愛喫鳳梨芭樂。

sentences.english: Someone mistook it as two different fruits, pineapple and guava .
sentences.chinese: 有人當它是鳳梨與芭樂，兩樣不同的水果。

sentences.english: I brough her a basket of pineapple guava.
Delivered the pineapple guavas to town.
Guava likes to hang out in the water near the filter.
sentences.chinese: 芭樂喜歡在過濾器附近徘徊。

sentences.english: Here is a picture of the same tree with two small guava fruits.
sentences.chinese: 這是同一棵樹的照片，剛好有兩棵小小的芭樂。

sentences.english: I have two kinds of fruits, apples and guavas. Which do you like more?
sentences.chinese: 我有兩種水果，蘋果跟芭樂。你比較喜歡哪種？

sentences.english: You can eat an apple or a guava .
sentences.chinese: 你可以喫蘋果或是芭樂。

definition: red pitaya/dragon fruit/dragon pearl fruit (genus Hylocereus)
food preserved in sugar or honey
(of alcohol) to go to one's head/(old) (of a bride-to-be) to bind one's hair into a bun/(of a prostitute) to receive a patron for the first time
above/on top of/on the surface of
cabbage/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]/Taiwan pr. [gao1 li4 cai4]
